featured.text: Helen _____ with anger when she saw her boyfriend kissing an attractive girl.
Helen: No, I didn’t, but I will.
Helen let out a sigh of ______ after hearing that her brother was not injured in the accident.

definition.zh_def: 海倫，通常指希臘神話中的一位美麗女性，特別是特洛伊戰爭的導火索。
definition.en_def: Helen, often referring to a beautiful woman in Greek mythology, particularly known as the cause of the Trojan War.
definition.example: Helen was considered the most beautiful woman in the world.
